### The Meninges.
.pull-left[

## (brain) ![:color blue](P) ![:color green](A) ![:color red](D)  

.bold[![:color red](Dura Mater)]
- Tough, flexible outermost meninx 
    - (i.e., toughest-outermost layer)
  
.bold[![:color green](Arachnoid Membrane)]  
- Middle layer of the meninges
  
.bold[![:color blue](Pia Mater)]  
- Last layer of the meninges
- adheres to the surface of the brain
